question: What type of agent are you building?

options.label: Fully autonomous agent
options.description: An agent that operates independently without human intervention

options.label: Human-assisted agent
options.description: An agent that collaborates with humans and requires human input

options.label: Workflow automation
options.description: An agent that automates specific tasks or workflows

question: How complex is the task your agent needs to accomplish?

options.label: Simple, well-defined
options.description: Clear inputs, outputs, and success criteria

options.label: Moderately complex
options.description: Multiple steps, some decision points required

options.label: Highly complex
options.description: Many interdependent steps, requires planning and reasoning

question: Does your agent need to remember information across sessions?

options.label: Long-term memory
options.description: Need to store and retrieve information across sessions

question: Will your agent need to use external tools or APIs?

options.label: No tools needed
options.description: Agent operates on provided information only

options.label: Few specific tools
options.description: Agent uses a small set of known tools

options.label: Many tools or dynamic discovery
options.description: Agent needs access to many tools or discovers tools dynamically

question: What level of safety and reliability is required?

options.label: Medium risk
options.description: Mistakes could cause problems but not critical failures

options.label: High risk / Critical
options.description: Mistakes could cause serious damage or security issues
